titles.title: A Charge to Keep I Have

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: A charge to keep I have, a God to glorify, a never-dying soul to save, and fit it for the sky.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: To serve the present age, my calling to fulfill, O may it all my pow'rs engage to do my Master's will!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Arm me with watchful care as in Thy sight to live, and now Thy servant, Lord, prepare a strict account to give!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Help me to watch and pray, and still on Thee rely, O let me not my trust betray, but press to realms on high.
